page.title: 15TOWN AREA AMENITIES
page.content: It contains various business premises including 2 Banks,4 Building Societies 3 Solicitors.For entertainment-3 Bars, 2 Cafes and 2 Chinese Restaurants,also 2 Video Shops,1 Record Shop.Health-3 Dental Surgeries.Communication-3 Post Boxes,Pen-y-coe Press-printers who pub lish Town Crier monthly-local news. {DAY IN LIFE OF A NINE YEAR OLD BOY 7.30am wake up,have breakfast.Then get washed and dressed,pack bag and go to school for 9.00am.Lunch 12.15pm-1.15pm Afternoon school ends 3.15pm-home,home work,out to play until 5.30pm-tea time After tea,Cubs,swimming or out to play 8.00pm bath then bed. {HOME LIFE-}most people eat breakfast, snack lunch and cooked meal in evening -favourite chicken or minced beef.Most people watch T.V between 10 and 20 hours a week.Over 60% do not smoke.
